text: Oh iwe Mtumwi! Takulola kukhala ndi akazi onse amene iwe wapereka chiongo chawo ndi iwo amene ndi akapolo ako kuchokera kugulu limene lidagwidwa pankhondo ndipo Mulungu wakupatsa iwe; ana a akazi a atsibweni ndi azakhali ako, a kuchimuna kapena kuchikazi amene adachoka pamodzi ndi iwe. Ndiponso mkazi wina aliyense wokhulupirira amene adzipereka yekha kwa Mtumwi ngati Mtumwi afuna kumukwatira iye. Chilolezo ichi ndi cha iwe wekha osati cha anthu onse okhulupirira. Ife tikudziwa chimene tawasankhira iwo zokhudza akazi awo ndi akapolo amene iwo amasunga, ndi cholinga chakuti pasadzakhale vuto kwa iwe. Ndipo Mulungu amakhululukira nthawi zonse ndipo ndiye Mwini chisoni chosatha
